# selectedObjects

**Instance Property**

An array of all objects to be affected by editing.

## Declaration

```swift
var selectedObjects: [Any] { get }
```

## Obtaining selections

- **selection**: A proxy object representing the receiver’s selection.

items.description: A proxy object representing the receiver’s selection.
